animeDescription: Yazawa, a Japanese pilot, suffers a crash in his Phantom jetfighter. After a six month recovery, his old friend from an airplane magazine wants him to investigate the appearance of a Phantom in an armed conflict in El Salvador. Yazawa's investigations makes him wind up in an international arms conspiracy. Based on a series of military fiction novels.
animeStaff: [['Dezaki Satoshi', ['Director']], ['Fujiyama Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Takizawa Toshifumi', ['Storyboard']], ['Shimizu Keizou', ['Character Design', 'Animation Director']]]
